alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Teton, northwestern Caribou, Fremont, southeastern Jefferson, north central Bannock, northern Bonneville, Madison, eastern Clark and southeastern Bingham Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking moderate to heavy showers with thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Island Park Reservoir to near Menan to near Moreland. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Blackfoot, Rigby, Ashton, Swan Valley, Felt, Ririe Reservoir, Chesterfield Reservoir, Goshen, Marysville, Lorenzo, Ammon, Shelley, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon, Menan, Teton and Ririe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
